code: import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";var initialState={address:""};export var userSlice=createSlice({name:"user",initialState:initialState,reducers:{setAddress:function setAddress(state,action){state.address=action.payload;}}});var setAddress=userSlice.actions.setAddress;export{setAddress};export var selectAddress=function selectAddress(state){return state.user.address;};export default userSlice.reducer;
